title: Can i get a rioters opinion
body:
I was permad last night and i want a different rioters opinion. Here is what the Rioter i spoke to said i was banned for.

[2:13] [All] midgetdik (Amumu): ight total %%% amumu it is
[4:18] [All] midgetdik (Amumu): yeah its gonna be lit fam
[4:31] midgetdik (Amumu): all ap team
[4:34] midgetdik (Amumu): this will be easy
[4:36] midgetdik (Amumu): xd
[4:39] midgetdik (Amumu): fuck this kid lol

[18:55] midgetdik (Amumu): guys
[19:00] midgetdik (Amumu): can you like fucking help me some
[19:06] midgetdik (Amumu): i know im super strong
[19:16] midgetdik (Amumu): but id like some dam help
[19:43] midgetdik (Amumu): why are we not then
[20:27] midgetdik (Amumu): someone
[20:28] midgetdik (Amumu): help
[20:30] midgetdik (Amumu): my ass out
[20:38] midgetdik (Amumu): maybe
[20:42] midgetdik (Amumu): fucking fight
[20:51] midgetdik (Amumu): when im doing constant max ho damage
[22:30] [All] midgetdik (Amumu): mundo fight me
[22:51] [All] midgetdik (Amumu): can i fight mundo only you fucking pussys

The first line is self deprecating humor idk how thats bannable to call myself a total %%%?

Second paragraph lines 1-12 there is nearly nothing toxic its asking my team for help although it can be seen in a rude light it isnt what most would call toxic.

The final line is possibly the only line i found toxic/unfair to others i probably shouldnt have called them pussys but im still not sure one line is a bannable offense?

Thank you for your time and i hope a rioter will respond.

replies.body:
> The first line is self deprecating humor idk how thats bannable to call myself a total %%%?

You're going to get the same response from every single Rioter; hate speech is not tolerated at all regardless of context.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZVZYZsAt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-26T14:18:19.118+0000)
>
> You're going to get the same response from every single Rioter; hate speech is not tolerated at all regardless of context.

tell that to my three friends who spammed the n word in a non self deprecating way, trolled in three ranked games one going 0/19, and none ever received punishment

Cases aren't reviewed unless they are large enough due to frequent reports; typically someone that gets away with toxic behavior like this just isn't like that normally. If a review is triggered against them, that behavior would absolutely result in a ban.

triggered off one game only was a urf game a mad zyra and toxic flaming ori was two that i know reported me. ori because i stopped trying cause i was tired and the zyra cause i laned vs them and they couldnt damage me

If you just came off a punishment you'll be on thin ice, so in a way yes it's possible for one game to trigger another review; however, if that's the case that still means it wasn't because of one match, it was the result of multiple prior punishments and continuing to show you had little intention of improving your behavior.

> because i stopped trying cause i was tired

Nobody wants a teammate that isn't interested in winning. Take breaks between matches if you're tilted, you don't necessarily have to sacrifice having fun to win but your team is counting on you so only queue up when you're ready to play the match out to its completion.
